column1: #Text=A polycrystalline BiCu3Cr4O12 sample was prepared by solid-state reaction under a high-pressure and high-temperature condition.
#Text=The sample was synthesized from the stoichiometric mixture of Bi2O3, CuO, CrO2, and Cr2O3.
#Text=The mixture was pressed at 9 GPa and heated at 1273 K for 30 min and then cooled to room temperature.
#Text=The pressure was slowly released after the heat treatment.
#Text=The obtained sample was confirmed to be a single phase by synchrotron X-ray diffraction (SXRD).
#Text=The results of structure analysis are given in Supporting information.
#Text=The structure parameters were refined by Rietveld analysis using the RIETAN-FP program44.
#Text=The crystal structure figures were drawn using the VESTA software45.
